text: Tara jaba isale uniharuko anastha sucaka niyatako anubhava garnubhayo ta bhanna thale ki allahako margama mero sahayata garne koâ€“ko chan? Havariharule javapha di'e ki hami allahako margako paksadhara haum. Hami allahamathi astha rakhyaum ra tapa'i saksi hunu ki hami adesa palana garnevala hau
